1.18.2.1.0.0:
The first open beta version of the fully updated Distant Worlds mod
Let's start our journey!
1.18.2.1.0.1:
Added attack animations for some mobs
Distant Worlds Book has been supplemented and improved
Added more durability to firon armor
Changed some parameters of interaction with salmoran egg
Other minor changes
1.18.2.1.0.2:
Item received after the ritual gets more data from the parent item
Added new enchantment rituals
Added salmoran sting enchantment
Added firon armor ability
Improved mechanism for using armor and tool abilities
Improved stone textures
Garsale cake can be placed
Added notifications about new recipes
Other minor changes
1.18.2.1.0.3:
Added disableBookGranting gamerule
Books were edited and supplemented
Garhenna book is also granted to player by achievement
Improved generation of dimension, biomes and structures
Improved mob spawning
Balanced characteristics of mobs
Improved some textures and sound effects
[Bugfix] Game crashes when mod entity changes and player uses a non-English localization or name tag has been used before
[Bugfix] Using firon multitool has a different result than vanilla hoe
[Bugfix] Player could gain a lot of experience by breaking garsale bookshelves with silk touch enchantment
[Bugfix] Some items could be repaired by merging, which shouldn't be the case
[Bugfix] Player could not get the achievement for entering dead valley biome
Other minor changes
1.18.2.1.0.4:
Added garsale and wiltum panes
Updated many textures
Books were edited and supplemented
Added progress bar to Garhenna Book
[Bugfix] Fixed incompatibility with newer versions of Patchouli
[Bugfix] Fixed asmulda bush models and textures
Other minor changes
1.18.2.1.0.5:
Books were edited and supplemented
Added configuration file
Removed disableBookGranting gamerule
Dimension generation has been significantly improved and changed
Added generation of huge culafite mushrooms and their blocks
Mechanisms for using geckolib and curios capabilities have been improved
Improved the quality of geckolib models and animations
Added rendering of curios accessory models
Added interactive description to some items
Improved mechanics of player interaction with some GUI
Changed mobs behavior and spawning
Added ability to change the behavior of tamed mobs: follow, wander, stay
Baby salmorans will be tamed by the nearest player in a small radius after hatching
Unarmored narhorns can be mounted
Added culafite mushroom on a stick
Added garsale couches
Added wiltum couches
Improved mechanics of using bonemeal
Culafite mushrooms can be grown into a huge version with bonemeal
Return ring can teleport nearby tamed entities to a specified point
Added mod potions brewing recipes
[Bugfix] Now bookshelves behind the solid block will not be counted by the table
[Bugfix] Partially fixed vine generation
[Bugfix] Fixed garsale tree generation
Other minor changes
